featured.title: Prestige Ecommerce
featured.shortDescription: A full stack platform(desktop,mobile,website) that provide an elegant and prestigous ecommerce experience for small shops, this includes a dektop app for the shop owner a mobile app for the clients and both a firebase/nodeJs server, built using nodeJs ,typescript , reactJS, flutter ,webosckets,firebase and mongodb. uses the password/user idir for checking the old owner beta website

page1.title: Prestige Ecommerce
page1.shortDescription: A full stack platform(desktop,mobile,website) that provide an elegant and prestigous ecommerce experience for small shops, this includes a dektop app for the shop owner a mobile app for the clients and both a firebase/nodeJs server, built using nodeJs ,typescript , reactJS, flutter ,webosckets,firebase and mongodb. uses the password/user idir for checking the old owner beta website

page1.title: Higuruma bot
page1.shortDescription: A dicord bot built for managing discussions and debates ,it provides various functionality like vocals,turns,pre-registring arguments...etc, built using nodeJs

page1.title: QRR Scanner
page1.shortDescription: A mobile app for scanning qr and barcodes and posting them through a rest api. Various features are present like timestamps ,grouping, duplications ...etc, built using kotlin and jetpackCompose

page1.title: Maintenance management
page1.shortDescription: A full stack app for managing periodic maintenance of factories , built using nodeJs , javaFx and mysql . An external server was used as an LB7 to redirect traffic to the company local server since they lacked the ressources to host the app or maintain an external infrastructure

page2.title: Cheque writer
page2.shortDescription: A desktop app for writing cheques , it allows you to write on top of cheques using a printer ,also includes a searchable history tracking feature, built using javaFx and sqlite

page2.title: Bac
page2.shortDescription: A simple app that provides exercises, solutions , lessons for bac students , it has a builtin timer and a progress/level tracking system, built using java , sqlite and androidX

page2.title: Rpg time manager
page2.shortDescription: A simple app that helps you manage your time and tasks using an rpg reward/quest system , built using flutter and sqlite
